text: phir agar teesaree baar bhee aurat ko talaaq (bain) de to usake baad jab tak doosare mard se nikaah na kar le us ke lie halaal nahee haan agar doosara shauhar nikaah ke baad usako talaaq de de tab alabatta un miya beebee par baaham mel kar lene mein kuchh gunaah nahin hai agar un donon ko yah gumaan ho ki khuda hadon ko qaayam rakh sakengen aur ye khuda kee (muqarrar kee huee) haden hain jo samajhadaar logon ke vaaste saaph saaph bayaan karata hai
